sentences.english: What is called bad women is only the pressure and distortion of patriarchal society to female personality.
sentences.chinese: 所謂“惡婦”只是男權社會對女性個性的壓制與扭曲。

sentences.english: To keep thee from the evil woman, from the flattery of the tongue of a strange woman.
sentences.chinese: 能保你遠離惡婦，遠離外女諂媚的舌頭。

sentences.english: A woman regarded as bad-tempered and evil.
sentences.chinese: 悍婦，潑婦，惡婦被認爲是脾氣很壞或邪惡的女人。

sentences.english: You don't look like no art-school cat to me.
sentences.chinese: 你看上去不像沒有藝術教養的惡婦。
